The Toothbrush of Tomorrow: A smart toothbrush that connects to your phone via Bluetooth, tracking your brushing habits and providing personalized feedback on brushing technique, timing, and brushing pressure. It also comes with a built-in timer and games to make brushing more fun!

Brush Buddy: A toothbrush with a built-in companion AI assistant that provides oral health advice, reminds you when it's time to brush, and even offers a "good brushing" badge when you've completed your routine. It also comes with a companion app that offers personalized oral health recommendations and tracking.

Sonic Toothbrush: A toothbrush that uses sonic technology to provide a more thorough and efficient cleaning experience. With up to 31,000 brush strokes per minute, this toothbrush ensures that your teeth are cleaned more effectively than ever before. It also comes with a built-in timer and different speed settings for a customized brushing experience.

Toothbrush with a Twist: A toothbrush that features interchangeable heads with different bristle patterns and shapes to cater to different oral health needs. Whether you have sensitive teeth, braces, or just want a more thorough clean, this toothbrush has you covered. It also comes with a travel case for easy storage and transportation.

Toothbrush that Tells a Story: A toothbrush that comes with a series of collectible toothbrush heads, each featuring a unique character or design. As you brush your teeth, the toothbrush head tells a story, keeping you engaged and motivated to brush for the full recommended 2 minutes. It also comes with a companion app that allows you to unlock new characters and stories as you progress.
